website_summaries.verdict: This well-sized bag comes with a variety of extras to get you started on your meal prep journey.
pros: Bag is big enough to fit the variety of BPA-free containers it comes with
Packaged with a shaker cup and 2 ice packs
Keeps food cold, so it stays fresh throughout the day
A functional design makes it a pleasure to use with a roomy interior that's easy to access
cons: The bag won't fit some containers properly

customer_reviews.title: Better than a brown paper sack
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a few months ago, and I use it during my work days for my lunch & snacks. Con: Condensation from the ice pack, when placed in the ice pack pocket located on the front zip down flap, soaks through the bag leaving it moist/wet on the outside of the bag. Pros: Better than a brown paper sack. Nice large size, and the food prep containers are solid and do not leak. Food stays cool throughout my 10 hour work shifts. Overall: Too expensive of a bag to have condensation leaking through the bag from the ice pack. Would I recommend this to a friend? No. Shop around and find a bag that doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: The best lunch pack ever, especially for Bariatric patients!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic lunch bag! I had Bariatric surgery and this was perfect for me! The side bag gave me a place to put protein and drink mixes as well as my medications and vitamins. The main pouch allowed me to put two smaller ice packs in the front to extend the length it kept cool. I could fit milk containers inside as well as the extra couple of meals and cheese sticks I need throughout the day. This was the best purchase so far and extremely functional. Made very well, too! I highly recommend this to someone that works 12-14 hour days or just wants to be able to store what they need.
customer_reviews.author: B. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I own and have used the jaxx fit and fresh original. I use it daily and have for the past 3 years. It held up well and is still in great condition but I needed something bigger. This bag is perfect. I can fit my meals for the entire day, snacks, and two frozen water bottles in the main compartment and my monster in the side compartment with plenty of room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Terebieniec

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this junk
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be able to last the majority of my 12 hour night shifts. I didn't expect it to last all night, but for as much money as it was, I expected at least 8 hours or so. This didn't even last 6 hours. The ice packs it came completely melted and none of my food stayed cold. Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Desi

customer_reviews.title: The bag is really large but great to fit in multiple containers
customer_reviews.text: Literally obsessed! The bag is really large but great to fit in multiple containers. Love the side pocket. Absolutely love this lunch box. Do not think I will use any other bag ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Family

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this bag is amazing. It's lasted me 6 months so far. I meal prep and work a whole lot. When this one gets torn from being used to much I'll definitely buy anther
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The size of the bag is excellent, food box size wonderful, quality food box and bag excellent.
customer_reviews.author: bader fahad

customer_reviews.title: 2nd favorite lunch box i've had.
customer_reviews.text: Good job on the bag, durable, retains the cold in fairly well, and the ice packs it comes with last a good 5 hours. Only downside seems to be getting different containers to fit with this.
customer_reviews.author: Skyline94

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This meal prep pak is just what I needed. I only wish there were more ice packs with it along with a little more room for drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband and he loves it. It has plenty of space for the amount of meals he preps. The overall quality is good and I'm sure it will withstand the wear and tear of everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: mt

customer_reviews.title: Missing shaker bottle
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag but did not receive a shaker bottle. The description states that it comes with a 28-ounce shaker bottle
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for his job and helping maintain his meal
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband...he loves it...PERFECT for his job and helping maintain his meal prep
customer_reviews.author: morgan hall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for having the meals for the whole day.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Handle has broken off and the bottle leaks waste of my money

customer_reviews.title: and after one month of use it smells horrible washed it in washer and smell does not go ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased one month ago, and after one month of use it smells horrible washed it in washer and smell does not go away waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia G.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for meal prep!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in medical school so I’m always on the go or traveling. This bag has been absolutely amazing in carrying my meals while also bringing my essential materials along for the ride. The material is now somewhat bartered in the sides, and I’ve had to had a tailor fix a strap for $10, but I’ve abused mine a fair bit and gone the world and back
customer_reviews.author: Shayan

customer_reviews.title: Great for meal prepping!
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the quality of this bag and its containers. It comes with a shaker bottle, six meal containers and two 4oz containers. They are microwave, freezer and dishwasher safe. I was looking for something larger because I work long shifts and one meal doesn't cut it. With this bag I can pack multiple meals and keep them cold if I need to. Really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I've not used it yet, just got it last night. Washed all of the containers and am ready to now use it. It looks to be of good quality and the container lids are very tight, a sign of no leakage!
customer_reviews.author: Wannaberetired

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Spill proof and it comes with a nice Shake cup inside, as well as plastic storage containers. I used this to travel across country. It came in handy for items I really wanted to keep cold. There is an ice pack enclosed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Uneke Van Nest

customer_reviews.title: large lunch box
customer_reviews.text: Love this lunch box. very good quality and a lot of room for meal prepping.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great investment...Best of the bunch
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one. The first one I purchased 3 years ago. I love it
customer_reviews.author: TERRANCE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag. I work 12s and it's great for needing to pack a lot of food
customer_reviews.author: KPal19

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag
customer_reviews.text: Decent bag but not exactly xl but does hold enough for a few meals
customer_reviews.author: shannon joyner

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t live without it!
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver for meal prep - and plenty of room for all the drinks in my meal plan as well!
customer_reviews.author: Sommer W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Perfect for my 14 hour shifts at work
customer_reviews.author: A. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: As a person heavily into fitness, I can say this will work. Has a blender bottle holder and a pouch on the right side I'm thinking for supplements. But it looks awesome too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Buy this NOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! This color was definitely hard to find anywhere else, but this is an awesome product! Keeps things cool, and I love the tuppaware that goes with it!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Item holds all the food I eat for the day. The two cold packs keep everything cold through the day. The agitator in the bottle also works perfectly, unlike the round springy ones.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Carlsom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Jaxx fitpak was exactly what I needed, plenty of space,, and plenty of meal containers with the pak.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Very large! It's what my husband wanted and we're pleased with the purchase. The only issue I have with it is that the containers don't fit well inside of each other and one of them has warped. I can fix this myself so it's not big issue, but it's still a little bit of a hassle. The snap on lids can also be very difficult to open.
customer_reviews.author: K Meyer

product_meta.title: Fit & Fresh JAXX FitPak XL Insulated Meal Prep Bag with Adjustable Shoulder Strap, Includes Set of 8 Containers, 2 Large Ice Packs and 28-ounce JAXX Shaker Bottle, Teal
product_meta.description: Color:TealThe Jaxx FitPak XL provides the same exceptional design and quality as our Original FitPak with more room and lots of added features! Now you can tote your bag over your shoulder using the padded carrying strap and keep your meals cooler for longer with two thicker ice packs. The meal management container set includes; (6) 2.75 cup containers and (2) half-cup side containers allowing you to carry a full days' worth of well balanced meals. Bag has a side drink pocket to hold the Jaxx shaker / water bottle and a zippered side pocket for items like keys, phone and money. The 28 oz. Jaxx shaker bottle breaks up protein powder and drink mixes with the powerful patented Jaxx agitator. Containers and lids are microwave, freezer, and dishwasher free. All components are completely nontoxic, food safe, and BPA-free.
feature_bullets: HEALTHY EATING MADE EASY: Eat healthier and save money with the JAXX FitPak XL all-in-one portion control system

LARGER SIZE: For longer days and bigger appetites, this XL set includes a large, durable insulated bag, (6) square 2.75-cup containers, (2) half-cup snack containers, a shaker bottle and two large ice packs
PATENTED SHAKER BOTTLE: Durable, 28-oz. water bottle fits in the side drink pocket and has unique JAXX agitator that mixes protein powder with ease for smooth shakes every time
EIGHT LEAK PROOF CONTAINERS: Tight fitting lids seal out messy leaks and drips, containers are freezer-safe for advance meal prep, microwave-safe for easy reheating and top-rack dishwasher safe

FOOD STAYS FRESH: Bag has adjustable, detachable shoulder strap for easy carrying and it’s the perfect size to hold meals and snacks for your day with thick insulation to keep food fresh until it's time to eat, measures 17"W X 7"D X 9"H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars60 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
